summary: This patch reduces the difficulty for the Moonpath to Elsweyr mod, bringing enemies down to the 15-35 range.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Moonpath to Elsweyr - Easier Elsweyr[/size]
[size=3]by TheInkBunny
version 1.0[/size]

DESCRIPTION
This patch reduces the difficulty for the Moonpath to Elsweyr mod, brining enemies down to the 15-35 range.

REQUIRES
Moonpath to Elsweyr

INSTALLATION
For manual installation simply place the "Easier Elsweyr.esp" in your data folder, and make sure it's loaded after all the content from the Moonpath to Elsweyr.

RECOMMENDED MODS:
Moonpath to Elsweyr (Audio Patch) by TheInkBunnyÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55820/?]Link[/url]
Moonpath to Elsweyr (Typo Patch) by Joesph Russell [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51556/?]Link[/url]A SPECIAL THANKS TO MUPPETPUPPET AND THE DESIGN TEAM FOR THEIR AMAZING CAMPAIGN
author: TheInkBunny
